subdisciplines.name: Ethno-aesthetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of aesthetics, or the philosophical and sensory aspects of music, specifically within cultural contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Ethnohistory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the historical context of music, including cultural, political, and economic factors.

subdisciplines.name: Ethnomusicological Linguistics
subdisciplines.description: The study of language and communication as they relate to music and musical cultures.

subdisciplines.name: Ethnomusicological Organology
subdisciplines.description: The study of musical instruments and their cultural contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Ethnomusicological Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the theoretical foundations of ethnomusicology, including questions of methodology and epistemology.

subdisciplines.name: Performance Practice
subdisciplines.description: The study of how music is performed within cultural contexts, including questions of style, improvisation, and interpretation.
